verses.text: And it came to pass on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* ye a \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*; and a \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* and a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, \add both\add* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*;

Also a \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: for to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* unto you.

¶ And they \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \add that\add* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* drew \w near|strong="H7126"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* that ye should \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* unto you.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Go|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* thy sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and thy burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for thyself, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

¶ \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* therefore \w went|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, which \add was\add* for himself.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* unto him: and he \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* out the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

But the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \w above|strong="H4480"\w* the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, he \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
And the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and the \w hide|strong="H5785"\w* he \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And he \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*; and \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w presented|strong="H4672"\w* unto him the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, which he \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And they \w presented|strong="H4672"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto him, with the \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w* thereof, and the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: and he \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he did \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w* and the \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \add them\add* upon the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w people’s|strong="H5971"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, which \add was\add* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* it, and offered it for \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, as the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*.

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H6213"\w* it according to the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft manner: or, ordinance\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w took|strong="H4390"\w* an \w handful|strong="H3709"\w* thereof, and \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w beside|strong="H0905"\w* the burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft took…: Heb. filled his hand out of it\f*

He \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* also the \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* and the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \add for\add* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, which \add was\add* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w presented|strong="H4672"\w* unto him the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, which he \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*,

And the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* and of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, the \w rump|strong="H0451"\w*, and that which \w covereth|strong="H4374"\w* \add the inwards\add*, and the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add above\add* the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*:

And they \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* upon the \w breasts|strong="H2373"\w*, and he \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

And the \w breasts|strong="H2373"\w* and the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w waved|strong="H5130"\w* \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* them, and came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w offering|strong="H6213"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And there \w came|strong="H3318"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* out from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*: \add which\add* when all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, they \w shouted|strong="H7442"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*.
